translator_note: Nothing in this file needs to be translated; these are all internal item definitions that will not show up in an inventory.

items.name: Playtime Random Material Tokens Weekly
items.description: After 30 minutes of playtime, once per week, grants material tokens

items.name: Playtime Random Material Tokens Weekly Bundle
items.description: Grants tokens: 20-50 common or ultra-common, 5-10 uncommon, 1-5 rare, 10-30 regional

items.name: Playtime Random Material Tokens Extended
items.description: Every 6 hours of gameplay (no window), grants bonus tokens

items.name: Playtime Random Material Tokens Extended Bundle
items.description: Grants tokens: 5-10 common or ultra-common, 1-3 uncommon, 1 rare (10% chance), 2-5 regional
